title: Social-network analysis reveals animal bonding behaviors (University of Illinois at Chicago)
text: ( Source : University of Illinois at Chicago ) Dynamic communities of the two equids show a cohesive structure of Grevy's zebra versus very transient one for onagers. Image credit: Tanya Berger-Wolf , Chayant Tanipathananandh, Daniel
